General.Name: Life & Banc Split Corp
General.Description: Life & Banc Split Corp. is a closed-ended equity mutual fund launched and managed by Brompton Funds Limited. The fund invests in the public equity markets of Canada. It seeks to invest in stocks of companies operating across banking and life insurance sector. The fund primarily invests in the stocks of the six largest banks of the country, as well as of life insurance companies, utilizing a split share structure on a low cost basis. It benchmarks the performance of its portfolio against the S&P/TSX Capped Financials Index and S&P/TSX Composite Index. Life & Banc Split Corp. was formed on September 6, 2006 and is domiciled in Canada.
